title: Stratford Circus Arts Centre
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Attached to the Studio Theatre at Stratford Circus. As of March 2016, there are three clearly marked vegan main choices on the menu. All food is made-in-house from scratch. Vegan choices include spiced sweet potato pancakes with avocado and pomegranate salad; a smoked tofu and almond burger; flat bread with salad; fried aubergine; hummus and others, all of which come with zhoug - a pleasant herb sauce. Also has soy milk for coffee/tea and the Crate Beer on offer is vegan. The staff understands what a vegan is, and speaks with the chef to be sure they are providing up-to-date options.
